animeDescription: Kansen 2 (like the first episode) takes place during the initial outbreak of the Unknown virus epidemic, but the protagonists here have a much harder lot because they are stuck in the middle of a contaminated city immediately after its destruction by a mysterious cataclysm.Stalked by hordes of infected maniacs, Hiroshi Ookura and his friends seek safety inside a mostly intact shopping mall, but madness and death are everywhere...(Source: VNDB)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Kansen: Inyoku no Rensa', 'Sequel: Kansen 3: Shuto Houkai']
